title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when I select SWT.MULTI option in the control. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: I noticed that when I choose SWT.MULTI option, the ControlExampleText widget emits a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
